Reviews.Title: “great value and location”

Reviews.Content: worried staying reading reviews pleasant surprise clean spacious 2 levels overlooking beautiful courtyard polite helpful staff bathroom tiny clean breakfast plain adequate 2 minute walk tube bars restaurants fantastic value especially london
